ps2.6:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye.
ps2.6:1.3: Tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi—
ps2.6:2.3: Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṃhito;
ps2.6:2.4: yo cāyaṃ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṃhito.
ps2.6:2.5: Ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
ps2.6:3.1: Katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?
ps2.6:3.4: Ayaṃ kho sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
ps2.6:4.1: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ.
ps2.6:4.2: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṃ, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkhaṃ;
ps2.6:4.4: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ—
ps2.6:4.5: yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṃ—
ps2.6:4.7: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ—
ps2.6:4.8: yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo.
ps2.6:4.9: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ—
ps2.6:5.1: ‘Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:5.2: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:5.3: pariññātanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:6.1: ‘Idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:6.2: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:6.3: pahīnanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:7.1: ‘Idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:7.2: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:7.3: sacchikatanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:8.1: ‘Idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:8.2: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:8.3: bhāvitanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:9.1: Yāvakīvañca me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ na suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
ps2.6:10.1: Yato ca kho me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
ps2.6:10.3: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
ps2.6:11.2: Attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
ps2.6:12.1: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne āyasmato koṇḍaññassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
ps2.6:13.1: Pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke bhummā devā saddamanussāvesuṃ—
ps2.6:13.2: “etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
ps2.6:13.3: Bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā cātumahārājikā devā saddamanussāvesuṃ …
ps2.6:13.4: cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā tāvatiṃsā devā …pe…
ps2.6:13.10: “etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
ps2.6:14.1: Itiha tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttena yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi.
ps2.6:14.2: Ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvanti.
ps2.6:15.1: Atha kho bhagavā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi—
ps2.6:15.4: Iti hidaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa “aññāsikoṇḍañño”tveva nāmaṃ ahosi.
ps2.6:16.1: “‘**Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan’**ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:18.1: Cakkhuṃ dhammo, ñāṇaṃ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:18.2: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:18.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:18.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:19.1: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:19.2: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:19.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:19.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:20.1: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.
ps2.6:20.2: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:20.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:20.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:21.1: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:21.2: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:21.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:21.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:22.2: pariññātanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:24.1: Cakkhuṃ dhammo, ñāṇaṃ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:24.2: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:24.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:24.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:25.1: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:25.2: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:25.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:25.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:26.1: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.
ps2.6:26.2: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:26.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:26.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:27.1: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:27.2: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:27.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:27.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:28.1: Dukkhe ariyasacce pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:29.1: “‘**Idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccan**’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:29.4: pahīnanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:30.1: Dukkhasamudaye ariyasacce pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:31.1: “‘**Idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccan**’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:31.4: sacchikatanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:32.1: Dukkhanirodhe ariyasacce pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:33.1: “‘**Idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan**’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:33.3: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabban’ti …pe…
ps2.6:33.4: bhāvitanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:34.1: Dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ariyasacce pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:35.1: Catūsu ariyasaccesu saṭṭhi dhammā, saṭṭhi atthā, vīsatisataniruttiyo, cattālīsañca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:36.1: “‘Ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:36.3: Sā kho panāyaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā bhāvetabbāti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:36.4: bhāvitāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:37.3: ayaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:37.5: Sā kho panāyaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanā bhāvetabbāti …pe…
ps2.6:37.6: bhāvitāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:38.1: “‘**Ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā**’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:38.3: sā kho panāyaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā bhāvetabbāti …pe…
ps2.6:38.4: bhāvitāti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:40.1: Cakkhuṃ dhammo, ñāṇaṃ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:40.2: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:40.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:40.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:41.1: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:41.2: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:41.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:41.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:42.1: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.
ps2.6:42.2: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:42.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:42.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:43.1: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:43.2: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:43.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:43.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:44.1: Kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhāne pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:45.3: **ayaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanā**ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:45.5: sā kho panāyaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanā bhāvetabbāti …pe…
ps2.6:45.6: bhāvitāti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:46.1: Dhammesu dhammānupassanā satipaṭṭhāne pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:47.1: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu saṭṭhi dhammā, saṭṭhi atthā, vīsatisataniruttiyo, cattālīsañca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:48.1: “Ayaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:48.3: So kho panāyaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.6:48.4: bhāvitoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:49.3: ayaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:49.5: So kho panāyaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:50.1: “‘Ayaṃ **chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo**’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:50.3: so kho panāyaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti …pe…
ps2.6:50.4: bhāvitoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:52.1: Cakkhuṃ dhammo, ñāṇaṃ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:52.2: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:52.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:52.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:53.1: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:53.2: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:53.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:53.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:54.1: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.
ps2.6:54.2: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:54.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:54.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:55.1: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:55.2: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:55.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:55.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:56.1: Chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgate iddhipāde pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:57.3: ayaṃ **vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo**ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:57.5: so kho panāyaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti …pe…
ps2.6:57.6: bhāvitoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:58.1: Vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgate iddhipāde pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:59.1: Catūsu iddhipādesu saṭṭhi dhammā, saṭṭhi atthā, vīsatisataniruttiyo, cattālīsañca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:60.1: “‘Samudayo samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:60.3: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:60.5: Vipassissa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:61.5: kassapassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:61.7: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, kassapassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:61.9: Kassapassa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:62.1: “‘Samudayo samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, gotamassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:62.3: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, gotamassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:62.5: Gotamassa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:63.1: Sattannaṃ bodhisattānaṃ sattasu veyyākaraṇesu sattati dhammā, sattati atthā, cattālīsasataṃ niruttiyo, asīti ca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:64.1: “‘Yāvatā abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:64.3: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:64.4: Abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:65.4: yāvatā sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:65.6: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:65.7: Sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:66.1: Abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭhe, pariññāya pariññaṭṭhe, pahānāya pahānaṭṭhe, bhāvanāya bhāvanaṭṭhe, sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭhe pañcavīsasataṃ dhammā, pañcavīsasataṃ atthā, aḍḍhateyyāni niruttisatāni, pañca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:67.1: “‘Yāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:67.3: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:67.4: Khandhānaṃ khandhaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:68.4: yāvatā asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:68.8: Asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:69.1: Khandhānaṃ khandhaṭṭhe, dhātūnaṃ dhātuṭṭhe, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhe saṅkhatānaṃ saṅkhataṭṭhe, asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭhe pañcavīsatisataṃ dhammā, pañcavīsatisataṃ atthā, aḍḍhateyyāni niruttisatāni, pañca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:70.1: “‘Yāvatā dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:70.3: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:70.4: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:71.3: yāvatā maggassa maggaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:71.7: Maggassa maggaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:72.1: Catūsu ariyasaccesu sataṃ dhammā, sataṃ atthā, dve niruttisatāni, cattāri ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:73.1: “‘Yāvatā atthapaṭisambhidāya atthapaṭisambhidaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:73.5: Atthapaṭisambhidāya atthapaṭisambhidaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:74.3: yāvatā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:74.7: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:75.1: Catūsu paṭisambhidāsu sataṃ dhammā, sataṃ atthā, dve niruttisatāni, cattāri ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:76.1: “‘Yāvatā indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ, ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phassitaṃ paññāya.
ps2.6:76.5: Indriyaparopariyattañāṇe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:77.5: yāvatā anāvaraṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phassitaṃ paññāya.
ps2.6:77.7: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:77.8: Anāvaraṇe ñāṇe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:78.1: Chasu buddhadhammesu diyaḍḍhasataṃ dhammā, diyaḍḍhasataṃ atthā, tīṇi niruttisatāni, cha ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:79.1: Paṭisambhidādhikaraṇe aḍḍhanavadhammasatāni, aḍḍhanavaatthasatāni, niruttisahassañca satta ca niruttisatāni, tīṇi ca ñāṇasahassāni, cattāri ca ñāṇasatānīti.
